import React from 'react'; import {ActionCreator} from "../../store/actions" import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import {SortLink} from "./sort_link"; import {AddUser} from"../add_user/add_user"; import {SearchBar} from '../search_bar/search_bar'; import {dataStateSelector, sortDataSelector, filterDataSelector} from '../../store/selectors' import {Preloader} from '../preloader/preloader' export const Table = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const sortData = useSelector(sortDataSelector); const isUsersLoaded = useSelector(dataStateSelector); if(isUsersLoaded != false){ return( <> {sortData.map(item => ( ))}
{item.id} {item.firstName} {item.lastName} {item.email} {item.phone}
) } return( ) }
